hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #the Key#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Ocarina C left Button#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Flame Maze Left Side Pot 2

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Red Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say all toasters toast toast.

GV (Waterfall).text: ${12 68 79}They say that Zelda is a poor leader.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a spider behind a #gate in the Water Temple# holds #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple MQ GS Triple Wall Torch

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that in the #Sacred Forest Meadow#, Sheik teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Twinrova# holds...^ #the Requiem of Spirit# and #a Green Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Zora Tunic#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #the Forest Medallion#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: Fingers-Mazda, the first thief in the world, stole fire from the gods.^But he was unable to fence it.&It was too hot.&He got really burned on that deal.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Fire Temple Small Key# and #the Light Medallion#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##the Market## has #2# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that racing #Damp's ghost# rewards...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #0# major items.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path to the #Spirit Medallion#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Volvagia# holds...^ #Zelda's Lullaby# and #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #the Enemy Souls of Bottom of the Well#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Whispering Walls Front Pot 1

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #2# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #1# major item.
